name: AFGHookshot
comment: Copyright 2016 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: OnWireDetach
methods.comment: Called whenever the wire is detached

methods.name: OnFire
methods.comment: Called locally when a player shoots the hookshot

methods.name: MoveAudioSourceInFrontOfPlayer
methods.comment: Move the audio in fron of the player

methods.name: RestoreAudioSourceToOriginalLocation
methods.comment: Stop updating position in front of the player

methods.name: OwnerLanded
methods.comment: Called whenever the actor we are attached to landed

properties.name: mMaxHookDistance
properties.comment: How far we will trace to try and find something to attach to

properties.name: mAccelRate
properties.comment: How fast do we accellerate toward the grappled target.

properties.name: mBrakeAccelRate
properties.comment: Accel bonus added when we are moving away from the grappled target.

properties.name: mCachedMovementComponent
properties.comment: A cached instance of the instigators movementcomponent

properties.name: mAttachDistance
properties.comment: Distance from player when attached, caluclated from mHookshotAudio
